title: VMware security advisory (AV25-860)
description: Between December 15 and 21, 2025, VMware published security advisories to address vulnerabilities in multiple Tanzu products:
products: .NET Core Tanzu Buildpack   version prior to 2.4.71 and 2.4.72
Cloud Native Buildpacks for VMware Tanzu Platform   versions prior to 0.6.1
Elastic Application Runtime for VMware Tanzu Platform   versions prior to 10.2.6+LTS-T, 10.3.2 and 6.0.23+LTS-T
Extended App Support for Tanzu Platform   version prior to 1.0.11
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
